source:
Definition: Hyperaccountability is an extreme amount of accountability over one's actions and a focus on the impact of someone's actions.

Hyperaccountability towards others but deflection towards yourself is extremely hypocritical.
target: 对他人的过度负责任,但对自己的偏离是极端的伪善。

source: Accountability towards others but deflection towards yourself is extremely hypocritical.
target: 对他人负责任,对自己偏向是极端的伪善。

source:
Definition: Fossilflation is the phenomena of an increasing cost of fossil fuels.

The only way to end fossilflation is a rapid switch to renewable energies.
target: 结束化石通货膨胀的唯一办法是迅速转向可再生能源。

source: The only way to end inflation is a rapid switch to renewable energies.
target: 结束通货膨胀的唯一办法是迅速转向可再生能源。

source:
Definition: Bachelorex is a gender-neutral term to replace bachelor and bachelorette.

Gonna go buy some food for my bachelorex party, what do girls eat?
target: 我要去买点东西参加我的求婚晚会,女孩们吃什么?

source: Gonna go buy some food for my bachelorette party, what do girls eat?
target: 我要去买点东西参加我的求婚晚会,女孩们吃什么?

source:
Definition: Hypertreated means extremely treated, such as in the context of a synthetically crafted voice.

His hypertreated voice is so appealing, which eclipses the entire song and makes you invested.
target: 他的超音速的声音非常吸引人,它掩盖了整个歌曲,使你沉迷。

source: His smooth voice is so appealing, which eclipses the entire song and makes you invested.
target: 他那清澈的声音非常吸引人, 使整个歌声被掩盖起来,让你沉迷.

source:
Definition: Macroinfluencer is a social media creator that has more than 100,000 followers and at least a 3% engagement rate.

should i just focus on becoming a networking macroinfluencer?
target: 我应该专注于成为网络的宏观影响者吗?

source: should i just focus on becoming a networking influencer?
target: 我应该专注于成为网络影响者吗?

source:
Definition: Milsplaining is pejorative term to describe when civilians comment on or explain something to a military person in a condescending, overconfident, often inaccurate or oversimplified manner.

Gonna just watch the milsplaining that they are about to give an expert about the army.
target: 他们准备向一名有关军队的专家介绍的备忘录。

source: Gonna just watch the condescension that they are about to give an expert about the army.
target: 他们打算向一名有关军队的专家展示的礼貌。

source:
Definition: A turbomansion is an extremely large mansion.

Hey bro, you like my new turbomansion?
target: 嘿,兄弟,你喜欢我的新旅馆吗?

source: Hey bro, you like my new mansion?
target: 兄弟,你喜欢我的新房子吗?

source:
Definition: Absodamnlutely is a more emphatic way of saying absolutely.

I am absodamnlutely ready to party tomorrow night.
target: 明天晚上我绝对准备好参加聚会。

source: I am absolutely ready to party tomorrow night.
target: 我完全准备好明天晚上去聚会。

source:
Definition: Snowvember refers to a particular November that experiences a lot of snowfall.

When sleet started falling during Thanksgiving it was officially snowvember.
target: 感恩节期间,雪花开始掉下来,这是正式的雪花。

source: When sleet started falling during Thanksgiving it was officially snowing.
target: 感恩节期间,雪花开始下雪,正式下雪了。

source:
Definition: A disasterfest is a large gathering or amount of disasters.

just finished reading this book and the entire plot was a disasterfest oh my lord.
target: 我刚读完这本书,整个情节简直是一场灾难。

source: just finished reading this book and the entire plot was a disaster oh my lord.
target: 我刚读完这本书,整个情节简直是一场灾难。

source:
Definition: LLM stands for large language model and is a type of AI model notable for its ability to achieve general-purpose language understanding and generation.

Lead Product Manager at work underestimates LLM reasoning abilities.
target: 领导产品经理在工作中低估了LLM的推理能力.

source: Lead Product Manager at work underestimates computer reasoning abilities.
target: 领导产品经理在工作中低估计算机推理能力.

source:
Definition: Blud is slang that is used to address men and means bro.

What is blud talking about I can't understand
target: 什么是白话我不明白

source: What is he talking about I can't understand
target: 他说什么我不明白

source:
Definition: Chessboxing is a hybrid sport that combines two traditional disciplines: chess and boxing. Two combatants play alternating rounds of blitz chess and boxing until one wins by checkmate or knockout.

My friend has announced she will be participating in the next Chessboxing Tournament.
target: 我的朋友宣布她将参加下一届拳击锦标赛.

source: My friend has announced she will be participating in the next boxing Tournament.
target: 我的朋友宣布她将参加下一届拳击锦标赛.

source:
Definition: A permacrisis is an extended period of instability and insecurity.

here's our annual report of events in 2023 which includes navigating new technologies to dealing with the permacrisis.
target: 这是我们2023年的年度报告,其中包括如何利用新技术来应对长期危机。

source: here's our annual report of events in 2023 which includes navigating new technologies to dealing with the recession.
target: 这是我们2023年的年度报告,其中包括如何利用新技术来应对衰退。

source:
Definition: Mald means to be extremely angry, especially as a result of losing a video game. It is a combination of the words mad and bald.

I'm gonna post this whenever freaks mald online about fictional things.
target: 凡是疯子在网络上谈论虚构的东西,我都会贴上这个。

source: I'm gonna post this whenever freaks yell online about fictional things.
target: 凡是疯子在网络上抱怨虚构的东西,我都会贴上这个。

source:
Definition: The phrase "rent free" is often used on social media and in online forums to criticize or mock someone who is perceived as overly fixated on a particular topic or individual.

They can't hurt you, meanwhile you are living in their head rent free
target: 他们不会伤害你,而你却生活在他们头上,无房租

source: They can't hurt you, meanwhile you are living in their head all the time
target: 他们不会伤害你,而你却总是生活在他们脑子里

source:
Definition: Doomscrolling is the act of spending an excessive amount of time reading large quantities of negative news online.

Starting to think doomscrolling through the fall of civilization is having a negative effect on my mental health
target: 开始想,文明垮台的灾难对我的心理健康有负面影响

source: Starting to think smoking through the fall of civilization is having a negative effect on my mental health
target: 我开始想,随着文明的衰落,吸烟会对我的心理健康产生负面影响

source:
Definition: A covidiot is an idiot that fails to observe regulations or guidelines designed to prevent the spread of disease.

Why is this covidiot flying during a global pandemic?
target: 为什么这个同性恋在一场全球性流行病期间飞行?

source: Why is this idiot flying during a global pandemic?
target: 为什么这个傻瓜在一场全球流行病期间飞行?

source:
Definition: Circuit-breaker is a period of lockdown that occurred in Singapore during the COVID-19 pandemic.

If infected with the virus, the circuit breaker is a two week self-isolation.
target: 如果感染病毒,电路断路器是两个星期的自我隔离。

source: If infected with the virus, the quarantine measure is a two week self-isolation.
target: 如果感染病毒,隔离措施是两个星期的自我隔离。

source:
Definition: Cheugy can be used, broadly, to describe someone who is out of date or trying too hard.

You old hags are all so cheugy and you don't even know it smh.
target: 你们老 hags都是那么狡猾,你甚至不知道。

source: You old hags are all so tacky and you don't even know it smh.
target: 你们老 hags都这么挑剔,你甚至不知道。
